document_data.name: Improved Thrice
document_data.mainbody: '''''Improved thrice''''' was a more powerful version of the ''[[thrice]]'' [[spell]].
document_data.Effects: After casting, the caster's abilities in physical combat were temporarily increased. Their skill in hand-to-hand combat and use of a melee weapon were both increased. The spell also increased the ability to cast spells with a touch effect.
document_data.Casting: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required a [[material component]], three [[tourmaline]]s of equal size. Each had to have a minimal value of at least 100 [[gp]]
document_data.History: This spell was known to be used by wizards of the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
